card.name: Tornado Flame
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less.

card.name: Super Spark
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone.

card.name: God Signal
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Search your deck. You may take a God from your deck and show that God to your opponent. Then shuffle your deck, and put that card on the top of your deck.

card.name: Super Trash Train, Fuuma Devil
card.text: ■ Whenever another creature is destroyed, you may draw a card.

card.name: Romanesk, the Dragon Wizard
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature, you may put the top 4 cards of your deck into your mana zone. ■ End Step

card.name: Olzekia, General of Decapitation
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses 2 of their creatures and destroys them.

card.name: Aqua Super Emeral
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. If you do, choose one of your shields and put it into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

card.name: Ultimus, Divine Law Elemental
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature is destroyed, search your deck. You may take a spell that has "Shield Trigger" from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Jose Wilbert, Gaia's Justice
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, play Rock-Paper-Scissors with your opponent. If you win, this creature gets "Triple breaker" until the End Step ■ When this creature would be destroyed, play Rock-Paper-Scissors with your opponent. If you win, return this creature to your hand instead.

card.name: Kiryu Jilves, Gaia's Roar
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your creatures gets "slayer" and "speed attacker" until the End Step

card.name: Colonel Koala, Forest Commander
card.text: ■ Over Drive—Light x1 Fire x1 ''(When you summon this creature, you may tap another 1 light and/or 1 fire card in your mana zone. If you do, this creature gets the following Icon

card.name: Elementius Thunderbolt Dragon
card.text: ■ While you have no shields, this creature gets "speed attacker". ■ When your last shield is broken, before you break that shield destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less. ■ When your last shield is put into your graveyard, before you put that shield into your graveyard, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Violence Thunder, Extreme Dragon Wizard
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Evolution—Put on one of your multicolored creatures. ■ Whenever this creature attacks your opponent and isn't blocked, draw 3 cards, your opponent discards 3 cards at random from their hand, and you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Choice of Destiny
card.text: ■ Reveal a card in your hand to your opponent. ■ If it's a nature card, search your deck. You may put a nature creature that costs 3 or less from your deck into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck. ■ If it's a fire card, one of your creatures in the battle zone gets "speed attacker" until the End Step ■ If it's a light card, you may untap one of your creatures in the battle zone at the End Step

card.name: Möbius Cloister
card.text: ■ Return a light, darkness, fire, or nature card from your mana zone to your hand.

card.name: Fire Crystal Bomb
card.text: ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 5000 or less. ■ Return a card from your mana zone to your hand.
